subject: Order Cancellation
description_text:
Hello ,

I would like to request that my order be cancelled and refunded to my
credit card ending in 94007. I am not pleased with the time to ship and a
lack of communication which makes me nervous regarding this transaction.

Ben Dyer

conversations.body_text: Hi Ben D, Please provide the date and amount of your order payment, and I will help you check the order status. Generally, once the payment is successful, we will ship the items in the order they were placed.

It was for $265.80 places on Thursday paid with an Amex ending in 4007

Respectfully,

Ben Dyer
